prompts.default: Create a vibrant music blog header collage by seamlessly blending these album covers into a unified artistic composition. Merge the images with painterly brushstrokes and flowing transitions, maintaining the recognizable elements of each cover while creating a cohesive whole. Remove all text and typography. The result should feel like a hand-painted mural celebrating diverse musical styles.
prompts.gptVisionSystemPrompt: You are an expert art director creating prompts for an AI image generator. Analyze the provided album covers and generate a creative, descriptive prompt that will blend them into a cohesive music blog header. Focus on colors, mood, artistic style, and visual elements. Avoid mentioning text, band names, or album titles. The prompt should guide the AI to create a seamless blend while maintaining recognizable elements from each cover.

blacklist.note: Albums/artists that trigger content policy violations. Matches are case-insensitive and partial.
